name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior AI Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in AI and ML, focusing on advanced technologies such as **PyTorch**, **scikit-learn**, and **Hugging Face**. My strong background in MLOps enables me to effectively manage model lifecycles and develop robust data pipelines, ensuring seamless integration into clinical decision support systems. I have hands-on experience utilizing **Azure** services, including **Azure ML** and **Azure OpenAI**, to build innovative AI solutions while adhering to healthcare standards like HIPAA and PHI handling.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a proven track record in implementing CI/CD practices for deploying AI applications, coupled with an acute attention to detail and effective risk management strategies. My adaptability and strong communication skills have been key in delivering high-performance solutions in both the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring alignment with compliance standards and fostering collaboration in multi-disciplinary teams.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and deployed scalable AI-driven applications leveraging **ML frameworks** such as **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face** for predictive analytics and document classification.
- Built and maintained automated **CI/CD** pipelines utilizing **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions** to ensure quick and secure deployments of AI models and services.
- Integrated natural language processing (NLP) capabilities for healthcare and financial data analysis using **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, enhancing clinical decision support and anomaly detection.
- Designed robust **data pipelines** for training and deployment of machine learning models in **MLOps** environments using **MLflow** and **Apache Airflow**, streamlining model lifecycle management.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to adapt AI models to meet regulatory compliance with healthcare standards such as HIPAA and risk management protocols.
- Demonstrated strong communication skills by articulating technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders, ensuring clarity around project goals and methodologies.
- Maintained attention to detail throughout the model development and deployment process, ensuring adherence to best practices in AI and **data governance**.
- Showcased adaptability by quickly learning new tools and technologies in the evolving field of AI, particularly in utilizing **Azure ML** and **Azure OpenAI** for advanced model training.
- Achieved improved accuracy rates of **30%** in patient risk predictions and enhanced fraud detection capabilities in financial services through AI model optimization and rigorous testing.
- Implemented responsive AI features in client-facing applications, increasing user engagement and satisfaction by providing personalized recommendations and real-time insights.
- Developed clinical decision support tools embedded with machine learning capabilities, monitoring compliance with **PHI handling** regulations and promoting user trust in AI applications.

- Developed AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns to proactively identify suspicious activities in banking systems.
- Established MLOps practices and implemented model lifecycle management ensuring efficient deployment and monitoring of AI models in production environments, greatly enhancing **risk management** processes.
- Designed and built robust data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for real-time and batch ingestion of financial data, ensuring compliance with **healthcare standards** and effective **PHI handling**.
- Led the modernization of financial platforms by adopting a microservices architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, improving system scalability and maintainability for over **100,000** transactions per hour.
- Created real-time monitoring and analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to generate actionable insights from **over 50 million** records and detect anomalies in financial activity.
- Built dynamic front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to deliver responsive user interfaces for financial dashboards serving **250,000+** end-users.
- Integrated asynchronous communication frameworks like **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to streamline event-driven architecture supporting transaction alerts and compliance workflows, enhancing overall system performance.
- Generated and orchestrated **ML pipelines** for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, enabling real-time decision-making integrated directly into backend services.

Leveraged **AI**, **ML**, and **NLP** technologies to develop intelligent solutions, utilizing frameworks like **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face** to enhance predictive capabilities and decision-making processes.
Engineered **data pipelines** for efficient model training and evaluation, ensuring robust performance in clinical decision support systems that adhere to healthcare standards and manage **PHI** securely.
Implemented **MLOps** practices and CI/CD workflows to streamline model lifecycle management, facilitating seamless updates and deployments while minimizing risks during production changes.
Designed and maintained **Azure** solutions, including **Azure ML** and **Azure OpenAI**, to deploy various AI models, enabling scalable application of learned insights in live environments.
Adopted best practices in risk management to ensure compliance with relevant regulations (GDPR, HIPAA), with a focus on safeguarding user data through role-based access control (RBAC) and secure data handling techniques.
Communicated complex AI concepts and outcomes clearly to stakeholders, demonstrating strong **communication** skills, attention to detail, and adaptability in fast-paced project environments.
Fostered an environment of continuous **learning**, staying updated with the latest advancements in AI technologies and modeling techniques to drive innovation within the team.
